name: Hanoi through your lens
description:
Hanoi - the ‘heart’ of Vietnam is not only famous for its heroic history but also thousand-year culture. To discover this beautiful city, first of all, we have to know about the greatest President ever of Vietnam – Uncle Ho (Ho Chi Minh) by visiting the Ho Chi Minh mausoleum and Ho Chi Minh Museum. 
Then we will study the Vietnamese culture and history by visiting the One-pillar-pagoda, Thang Long Citadel and the Vietnam Museum of Ethnology. Our tour will focus on all those things and I’m sure that you will see Hanoi in another way only in 1 day, follow me !

***
Our trip has 2 main parts. This is our overall schedule:

7:30 AM: Picking you up at your hotel
8:00 AM: Taking a taxi to Ho Chi Minh Museum, visiting around Ho Chi Minh mausoleum and One-pillar Pagoda (walking)
10:00 AM: Walking to Thang Long Citadel
11:30 AM: Taking a taxi to Phở Bát Đàn to have lunch
1:00 PM: Taking a taxi to return to your Hotel
